plays.text: Penalty to Trevor Letowski 2 minutes for High Sticking Oleg Saprykin
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Denis Gauthier and Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Matt Cooke 2 minutes for Holding Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Darren Langdon 5 minutes for Fighting Steve Montador
Penalty to Steve Montador 5 minutes for Fighting Darren Langdon
Penalty to Chris Clark 2 minutes for Boarding Marek Malik
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Roughing Bob Boughner
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Interference Bob Boughner
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Craig Conroy and Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Toni Lydman 2 minutes for Interference Trevor Linden
Goal scored by Brent Sopel assisted by Trevor Linden and Mattias Ohlund
Penalty to Mattias Ohlund 2 minutes for Hooking Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Blake Sloan 2 minutes for Holding Henrik Sedin
Goal scored by Ed Jovanovski assisted by Matt Cooke and Artem Chubarov
